title: Coachmark
summary: Coachmarks guide users through interface features.

ux-text.title: Writing UX text for coach marks
ux-text.section-content:
Each coach mark should focus on just one tip and highlight only the most important part of the page. Keep the message short and to the point.

The button text should always be "Close", and if thereâ€™s a link, it should say "Read more".
